definition: heredity/to inherit (a trait)/to pass on (to one's offspring)
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

pinyin: fei1 yi2 chuan2 duo1 xing2 xing4

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正进一步开展细胞遗传和育种利用研究。

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遗传的宗法制度毋宁是儒家文化的深厚社会基础。

sentences.english: Transposons are one cause of genetic diseases such as haemophilia .
sentences.chinese: 转位子是产生如血友病一类遗传病的一个致病因子。

sentences.english: Scientists conducted genetic tests on thousands of maize seed and leaf samples.
sentences.chinese: 科学家对数千份千玉米种子和叶的样本进行遗传测试。

sentences.english: Conclusion Mutations in the CYP1B1 gene have genetic heterogeneity.
sentences.chinese: 结论CYP1B1基因具有明显的遗传异质性。

sentences.english: Conclusions It was proved feasibility of DNA fingerprints in the heredity monitoring of inbred strain rat.
sentences.chinese: 结论证实了该方法在近交系大鼠遗传监测中的可行性。

sentences.english: Genetic counseling should be considered for individuals with a family history of albinism or hypopigmentation.
sentences.chinese: 遗传咨询应考虑个人与家族病史白化或色素缺失。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the regularity of various chromosome anomalies among heredity inquires.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨各类遗传咨询者染色体核型异常发生规律。

sentences.english: Mendelian genetics in the setting of neuropsychiatry.
sentences.chinese: 神经精神医学中的孟德尔遗传学。

sentences.english: Look on chapter 7 of the Didache.
sentences.chinese: 看《十二使徒遗传》的第7章。

sentences.english: Many of those present felt this atavistic fear.
sentences.chinese: 在场的那些人中，很多都感到这种隔代遗传的恐惧。

sentences.english: Relatively genetic background of barley landraces were complex.
sentences.chinese: 大麦地方品种遗传背景相对复杂。

sentences.english: Charaka also knew the fundamentals of genetics.
sentences.chinese: 查拉卡也知道遗传学的基本原理。

sentences.english: The Tiandan303 is a genetic monogerm polyploid sugar beet hybrid.
sentences.chinese: 甜单303是甜菜遗传单粒型多倍体杂交种。

sentences.english: A similar question remains for the inheritance of the epigenetic characteristics from parents to offspring.
sentences.chinese: 表观遗传特性的同样问题存在于亲代和子代之间。

sentences.english: The instability of morphological variation in flower of Z. grandiflora might be related to transposable genetic element.
sentences.chinese: 花形变异的不稳定性可能与转座遗传因子有关。
